section.title: Tracking of changes in response to the 2nd Public Review
section.para: This section tracks major changes made to this specification compared to the Committee Specification Draft 02 https://docs.oasis-open.org/lexidma/dmlex/v1.0/csd02/dmlex-v1.0-csd02.pdf. The second Public Review took place from 31st January 2024 until 29th February 2024.

listitem.para: A method for constructing fragment identification strings has been added to the specification (GitHub issue 97).
Consistency has been introduced to the use of <text> child elements in the XML serialisation. (GitHub issue 72).
Clarifications have been added on how whitespace should be handled, both at the level of the data model and in the XML serialisation (GitHub issue 84).
Several validation artifacts have been added to the specification, including an XML schema and a JSON schema (GitHub issue 93).
A clarification has been added on element ordering in the XML serialisation (GitHub issue 117).
A clarification has been added to the XML serialisation on which elements can be the top-level elements in a DMLex-comformant XML document (GitHub issue 118).
